about_the_game: Skid is being developed by EXEAIO Studio. An indie studio with AAA dreams. We were frustrated by the lack of open world VR bike racing sim in PCVR and Oculus Quest 2 so we ultimately took the leap of faith. Skid features the adrenaline-fueled police chase inspired by the NFS series and also features a cluster of semi-open world 5km square maps inspired from cyberpunk where players can free-roam with our AI traffic system. Additionally, players can take part in pop-up races in the VR world followed by occasional cops show-down. We have a robust multiplayer mode where players can participate in seasonal championships for trophies. Both standalone quest and PCVR versions have cross-plays and are almost identical in terms of maps and features. Both versions are still actively in development.
